articles.author: Tyler Greenawalt
articles.title: NBA Finals: Why Nuggets head coach Michael Malone didn't take a timeout before final play of Game 2 loss - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Malone let the final seconds of Game 2 play out despite owning two timeouts.
articles.content: Down three with 11.4 seconds left in Game 2 of the NBA Finals, Denver Nuggets head coach Mike Malone elected not to use one of his two timeouts to set up one final offensive play after his team snagg… [+2246 chars]

articles.author: Michael C. Wright
articles.title: Finals MVP Ladder: Nikola Jokic remains at top, but Heat players rising - NBA.com
articles.description: Bam Adebayo, Jimmy Butler and Gabe Vincent all take flight as Nikola Jokic continues to hold down our No. 1 spot.
articles.content:
Bam Adebayo found a way to make a major impact in Game 2 of the NBA Finals.
DENVER — The Miami Heat utilized a trio of 20-point scorers to topple the Denver Nuggets, 111-108, in Game 2 on Sunday. In… [+6974 chars]
